title: School of Journalism and Communication
content: Representatives of YangCheng Evening News (Group) Visit the School of Journalism and Communication for Inspection and Discussion On November 15, Hu Quan, member of the CPC Committee, Vice President, and Deputy Editor-in-Chief of YangCheng Evening News (Group), and Deng Qiong, Director of the Cultural Supplement Department of YangCheng Evening News (Group), visited the School of Journalism and Communication. Ma Changhong, Secretary of the CPC Committee of the School, met with the above guests. The two sides carried out discussions and exchanges on media convergence development, all-media talent cultivation, and university-
